items.name: David Ott
items.text: It's friendly and easy to use. The world in general can be a dangerous and unhappy place if you let it. It's nice to know there's somewhere you can go and just be yourself and enjoy life

items.name: D "Dave" H
items.text: So far it's good, I like the format and it's easy to use. I've only been on a couple minutes and already meeting people. I like the fact that they verify everyone before you ever get to log on.
